title: Audit a Freight Invoice
description: An accounts payable clerk needs to audit a carrier's freight invoice against the agreed-upon rate before approving it for payment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the freight invoice and the original rate confirmation for the specified shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls both the invoice and the rate agreement.

tasks.description: Compare the invoiced amount, including linehaul and fuel surcharge, against the amounts on the rate confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the carrier has overcharged for the fuel surcharge.

tasks.description: Short-pay the invoice with a note explaining the discrepancy and approve the corrected amount for payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adjusts the payment amount and adds a clear reason code.
